properties.areaDesc: Northern Oxford; Northern Coos; Southern Coos
properties.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 16 at 9:12AM EST until January 16 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Gray ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 3
inches for a storm total of 4 to 8 inches.

* WHERE...In New Hampshire, Northern Coos and Southern Coos
Counties. In Maine, Northern Oxford County.

* WHEN...Until 5 PM EST this afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Roads will become snow covered and slippery, with
snow accumulations affecting the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

For a more precise forecast for your specific location...go to
www.weather.gov/gray..

NWSheadline: WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON
